title: JUST Definition & Meaning - Merriam-Webster
text: 1 a : having a basis in or conforming to fact or reason : reasonable had just reason to believe he was in danger b : conforming to a standard of correctness : proper just proportions c archaic : faithful to an original justly adverb 2 a : by a very small margin : barely just too late b : immediately, directly just west of here see also just about Love words? Need even more definitions? Merriam-Webster unabridged
